data: deck of the packet Montauk | quarter-deck rail | coast

Some such thoughts as these passed through the mind of the traveller who stood on the deck of the packet Montauk, resting an elbow on the quarter-deck rail, as he contemplated the view of the coast that stretched before him east and west for leagues.
Homeward Bound; Or, the Chase: A Tale of the Sea
